code: @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     applicationContext = createApplicationContext().     super.setUp().     assertNotNull("Should have created a valid spring context", applicationContext). }
@After public void tearDown() throws Exception {     IOHelper.close(applicationContext).     super.tearDown(). }
@Override protected CamelContext createCamelContext() throws Exception {     return SpringCamelContext.springCamelContext(applicationContext, true). }
